about_the_game:
In the aftermath of the world's destruction, a unique mechanical city was established underground by some survivors. However, limited resources forced the population to split again, leading to constant conflicts between the "Explorers" and the "Utopians." Ultimately, war broke out once again, but no human emerged victorious. Today, only ruins and robots faithfully executing their programs remain in the underground world.

Decades later, a robot named ABYA unexpectedly awakens from its hibernation pod. An awakened intelligent brain informs it that there may still be human civilization on the surface, but the central elevator leading to the surface has stopped functioning. Guided by the intelligent brain, ABYA picks up its weapon and begins to explore the deserted and silent underground...

Coherent and Compact 2D Platforming Experience

The desolate underground city has fallen into disrepair, and the lack of electricity has made most areas difficult to traverse. To successfully explore or reach your destination, you need to think strategically, utilize your existing equipment, and navigate with agility.

Multiple Practical or Fun Special Ammunition

As a member of the intelligent mechanical firefighting team, your special water gun is your greatest secret weapon. With various ammunition mechanisms, you will no longer fear any challenges, whether it's poison gas, high platforms, or crevices!

The Truth Is Not in Others' Words

The disaster that destroyed the underground city seems to hide an even greater secret. Truth or lies? It's difficult to argue. To open the elevator to the surface, you should personally seek the truth about yourself and the world.

Customize Your Own Maps

"ABYA:Paint Ball" not only allows you to create exclusive levels using a map editor, add rules, and personalize modules, but also supports importing player-made MODs from the Workshop to create even more unique level scenarios.

short_description: A hardcore platform-action game! Robot ABYA wakes up in the depths of end - times ruins. With a special water gun, it starts to uncover the apocalypse's truth. As it explores underground ruins, ABYA leaps, climbs, and shoots, pushing survival limits and gradually revealing doomsday mysteries.
